sentences.sentence: But that hides the puniness of the economy.
sentences.translation: 但是这掩盖了经济的弱小。

sentences.sentence: Say to myself: you can never give up or draw back for your puniness at present, you are born to be an eudemon.
sentences.translation: 对我自己说：目前你不能因为自己的渺小而放弃或退缩。你生来就是守护灵！

sentences.sentence: Contrast anomaly method and normalization method have the near same calculating model, and can also identify puniness anomalies.
sentences.translation: 衬度异常法和归一化法的计算模型近于一致，对弱小异常也有一定的识别作用。
